modName: Better Sorting for - An NPO Module Crossbows
summary: This adds sorting for all Arrows and Bolts in Skyrim including those added by An NPO module - Crossbows
descriptionHtml:
I am a neat freak and like the sorting mods but couldn't find any that worked with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43517/?]An NPO Module[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]
[/url]
This changes all ammo marked as playable to the following pre-fixes:

Arrow - Type
Bolt - Type
Bolt - Type (subtype)

That's all it does just like all the other sorting mods.

You will need the following requirements:

Skyrim, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
The latest official updates.
The latest un-official updates.
The NPO crossbows module.

I have added a optional that also includes the ammo from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?]Faction Crossbows[/url]
(You have to have the Faction Crossbows mod also)

Fully compatible with Weapons and armor fixes remade!

I am very willing to make sorting compatibility additions for any mods or combos of mods just ask in the discussion section!

[color=#00ff00][b][size=6]My Mods:[/size][/b]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77359/?]Book Covers Skyrim (USLEEP) Patch[/url]
